metadata.title: CVE-2021-20293 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) flaw was found in RESTEasy in all versions of RESTEasy up to 4.6.0.Final, where it did not properly handle URL encoding when calling @javax.ws.rs.PathParam without any @Produces MediaType. This flaw allows an attacker to launch a reflected XSS attack. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

advisory.discovered_by: Jeremy Bonghwan Choi, Ted Jongseok Won

criterions.comment: resteasy package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
resteasy3.0 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
